definition: France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: Harm is a kind of unprofitable state of which right and law have been impaired.
sentences.chinese: 损害是权利和法益受损的一种不利益状态。

sentences.english: The essence of the object of crime is the judgment on law profit violated by the criminal behavior.
sentences.chinese: 犯罪客体的实质是就行为的法益侵害性进行判断。

sentences.english: Legal interest is defined as the interest and value confirmed and protected by law.
sentences.chinese: 法益是指由法律确认和保护的利益和价值。

sentences.english: The yardstick to distinguish informal intent crime should be the infringement of the legal interest.
sentences.chinese: 法益侵害则是划定非法定目的犯的基本标准。

sentences.english: In another words, the"commence"of the robbery has to be the behavior of violation on the rights of laws.
sentences.chinese: 即抢劫罪中的着手必须是具有法益侵害现实性的行为。

pinyin: she4 hui4 gong1 gong4 li4 yi4

definition: actual sin (Christian notion, as opposed to original sin 原罪)
